sentences.english: "And also this affair must be discreet, " Kugelmass continued.
sentences.chinese: “然后同样这次外遇必须保密，”库马思继续。

sentences.english: Key work in understanding the problems of using animal blood for human transfusions was provided by Ponfick and Landois.
sentences.chinese: 颇费克和兰德思发现了给人输注动物血的关键问题。

sentences.english: Hawkes never went back to Peking, or to China.
sentences.chinese: 此后霍克思再也没有回过中国，回过北京。

sentences.english: "I got held up in traffic, " Kugelmass said.
sentences.chinese: “我被堵车给耽搁了，”库马思说道。

sentences.english: Must complete in the anti-terrorist combat to think of them political work earnestly.
sentences.chinese: 必须切实做好反恐作战中的思m政治工作。

sentences.english: Sigurdur Gudmundsson is one of Iceland's most international artists.
sentences.chinese: 思故都是冰岛最国际化的艺术家之一。

sentences.english: More diseases are thought fields, ap pension money has exiled shame.
sentences.chinese: 身多疾病思田里，邑有流亡愧俸钱。

sentences.english: Located on a mews lane in Rathmines it is sufficiently large to support a family over a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 位于马厩里拉思曼斯它大到足以支持一个家庭的一生。

sentences.english: Do not make yourself uneasy, my dear cousin, about your apparel.
sentences.chinese: 不要为衣装担心思，亲爱的表妹。

sentences.english: " Qi Baishi's "ground" and "thinking" in this view, an unrivaled.
sentences.chinese: 齐白石的“勤”和“思”，在今天看来，无人可比。

sentences.english: Back in Oxford Hawkes completed his doctoral dissertation on The Songs of the South.
sentences.chinese: 回到牛津后，霍克思完成了他的博士论文《论楚辞》。

sentences.english: Hawkes is survived by his wife, Jean, three daughters and a son.
sentences.chinese: 霍克思身后遗下太太琼，及三个女儿一个儿子。

sentences.english: Strickland seized his glass and flung it at him.
sentences.chinese: 思特里克兰德抄起酒杯，向他扔去。

sentences.english: Leaning is thinking, Skill by heart.
The latter also negates the function of language in" Thinking the Existence".
sentences.chinese: 后者也否定语言在“思存在”方面的作用。
